name: Project Re:RISE
description:
Project re:Rise is a top-down game in the vein of the round based gameplay of Call of Duty Zombies. 

Most things that you should expect in a zombies game are here: Buying between 5 random guns, 6 perks, upgrading weapons, map interactions...

If you enjoyed this game, please fill this google form to give me some feedback:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdePjclXqPuF-Pmph5tJoi7bqNpUD1Luvy6SnWu...

______

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement (In Game)

F - Interact (In Game)

Shift - Sprint (In Game)

Left Click - Select (In Menus) / Shoot (In Game)

Right Click - Aim (In Game)

Esc - Pause Menu (In Game)
